message: I propose we divide the money with a 70/30 split in your favor. Remember, inflation will affect us differently in each round.
I'll give you a fair split, but I'm not going to give you the lion's share. You can do better than that!
I propose an equal split of the remaining funds. It seems we both value fairness in this game.
You're trying to be fair, but I think I can do better than that. I'll give you a slight discount, but I'm not going to give up too much ground.
